query.statement:
WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT substr(HOLIDAY_YMD,1,6) AS HOLIDAY_YMD , INTEGER(RIGHT(LAST_DAY( CAST(LEFT(substr(HOLIDAY_YMD,1,6),4)||'-'||substr(substr(HOLIDAY_YMD,1,6),5,2)||'-'||'01' AS DATE)),2) ) - COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM DB2WEB.TB_HOLIDAY GROUP BY substr(HOLIDAY_YMD,1,6) ) SELECT PAPRYYYYMM , MANDT , TEAM_CD , TEAM_NM AS TEMNM , ZZACTSS_CD , ZZACTSS_NM AS ZZACTSS , LIFNRNM , NAMET AS NAMET2 , LIFNR , TEMNO , CASE WHEN CNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CNT END AS CNT , CASE WHEN CNT_SUM IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CNT_SUM END AS CNT_SUM , CASE WHEN CNT2 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CNT2 END AS CNT2 , CASE WHEN CNT3 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CNT3 END AS CNT3 , CASE WHEN TOT_MH IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOT_MH END AS TOT_MH , CASE WHEN TOT_MH_SUM IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOT_MH_SUM END AS TOT_MH_SUM , CASE WHEN CNT2_SUM IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CNT2_SUM END AS CNT2_SUM , CASE WHEN PER_TOT_MH IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE PER_TOT_MH END AS PER_TOT_MH , CASE WHEN PER_TOT_MH_SUM IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE PER_TOT_MH_SUM END AS PER_TOT_MH_SUM , CASE WHEN CNT1_SUM IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CNT1_SUM END AS CNT1_SUM , CASE WHEN CNT1 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CNT1 END AS CNT1 , POINT , POINT_SUM , counting , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY CASE WHEN POINT_SUM IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE POINT_SUM END DESC) AS RANKING FROM ( SELECT PAPRYYYYMM , MANDT, ZZACTSS , TEAM_CD , TEAM_NM , ZZACTSS_CD , ZZACTSS_NM , LIFNR , LIFNRNM , TEMNO , NAMET , CNT , CNT_SUM , CNT2 , CNT3 , TOT_MH , TOT_MH_SUM , CNT2_SUM , PER_TOT_MH , PER_TOT_MH_SUM , CNT1_SUM , CNT1 , POINT -- , CASE WHEN CNT1_SUM > 0.00 AND CNT1_SUM <= 0.55 THEN 1 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 0.55 AND CNT1_SUM <= 0.60 THEN 2 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 0.60 AND CNT1_SUM <= 0.65 THEN 3 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 0.65 AND CNT1_SUM <= 0.70 THEN 4 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 0.70 AND CNT1_SUM <= 0.75 THEN 5 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 0.75 AND CNT1_SUM <= 0.80 THEN 6 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 0.80 AND CNT1_SUM <= 0.85 THEN 7 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 0.85 AND CNT1_SUM <= 0.90 THEN 8 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 0.90 AND CNT1_SUM <= 0.95 THEN 9 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 0.95 AND CNT1_SUM <= 1.00 THEN 10 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 1.00 AND CNT1_SUM <= 1.05 THEN 11 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 1.05 AND CNT1_SUM <= 1.10 THEN 12 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 1.10 AND CNT1_SUM <= 1.15 THEN 13 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 1.15 AND CNT1_SUM <= 1.20 THEN 14 -- WHEN CNT1_SUM > 1.20 THEN 15 -- ELSE 0.00 -- END AS POINT_SUM , SAPHEE.GET_POINTS(#G_MANDT#, '1601005','3',CNT1_SUM) AS POINT_SUM , counting
FROM ( SELECT PAPRYYYYMM , MANDT, ZZACTSS , TEAM_CD , TEAM_NM , ZZACTSS_CD , ZZACTSS_NM , LIFNR , LIFNRNM , TEMNO , NAMET , CNT , CNT_SUM , CNT2 , CNT3 , TOT_MH , TOT_MH_SUM , CNT2_SUM , PER_TOT_MH , DEC(nullif(TOT_MH_SUM,0)/ nullif(CNT2_SUM,0), 10, 2) AS PER_TOT_MH_SUM , DEC( ( dec(TOT_MH_SUM,10,2) / DEC(CNT2_SUM, 10,2)) / dec(CNT_SUM / counting, 10, 2) , 10, 2) AS CNT1_SUM , CNT1 , POINT , counting FROM ( SELECT PAPRYYYYMM , MANDT, ZZACTSS , TEAM_CD , TEAM_NM , ZZACTSS_CD , ZZACTSS_NM , LIFNR , LIFNRNM , TEMNO , NAMET , CNT , CNT2 , CNT3 , TOT_MH , SUM(TOT_MH) OVER (PARTITION BY LIFNR, TEMNO ORDER BY LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS TOT_MH_SUM , SUM(CNT2) OVER (PARTITION BY LIFNR, TEMNO ORDER BY LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS CNT2_SUM -- 보유인원 , SUM(CNT) OVER (PARTITION BY LIFNR, TEMNO ORDER BY LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS CNT_SUM , PER_TOT_MH , CNT1 , POINT , COUNT(TEMNO) OVER (PARTITION BY LIFNR, TEMNO ORDER BY LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS counting FROM ( SELECT Q.PAPRYYYYMM , Q.MANDT , W.ZZACTSS , L.TEAM_CD , L.TEAM_NM , L.ZZACTSS_CD , L.ZZACTSS_NM , Q.TEMNO , (SELECT DISTINCT LL.NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0002 LL WHERE LL.MANDT = Q.MANDT AND LL.TEMNO = Q.TEMNO FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS NAMET , Q.LIFNR , (SELECT DISTINCT NN.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0034 NN WHERE NN.MANDT = Q.MANDT AND NN.LIFNR = Q.LIFNR AND NN.GBN = 'A') AS LIFNRNM , Q.CNT -- 월근무MH (근무일수*10시간) , Q.CNT2 -- 보유인원 , Q.CNT3 , Q.TOT_MH -- 실적M/H , Q.PER_TOT_MH -- 인당실적MH(실적MH/월말보유인원) , Q.CNT1 -- 인당기성설치대수 = 인당실적MH/월평균인당MH(월말보유인원*근무일수*10) -- , CASE WHEN Q.CNT1 > 0.00 AND Q.CNT1 <= 0.55 THEN 1 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 0.55 AND Q.CNT1 <= 0.60 THEN 2 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 0.60 AND Q.CNT1 <= 0.65 THEN 3 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 0.65 AND Q.CNT1 <= 0.70 THEN 4 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 0.70 AND Q.CNT1 <= 0.75 THEN 5 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 0.75 AND Q.CNT1 <= 0.80 THEN 6 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 0.80 AND Q.CNT1 <= 0.85 THEN 7 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 0.85 AND Q.CNT1 <= 0.90 THEN 8 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 0.90 AND Q.CNT1 <= 0.95 THEN 9 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 0.95 AND Q.CNT1 <= 1.00 THEN 10 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 1.00 AND Q.CNT1 <= 1.05 THEN 11 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 1.05 AND Q.CNT1 <= 1.10 THEN 12 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 1.10 AND Q.CNT1 <= 1.15 THEN 13 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 1.15 AND Q.CNT1 <= 1.20 THEN 14 -- WHEN Q.CNT1 > 1.20 THEN 15 -- ELSE 0.00 -- END AS POINT , SAPHEE.GET_POINTS(#G_MANDT#, '1601005','3',Q.CNT1) AS POINT FROM ( SELECT PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO -- , (nullif((SELECT CNT FROM TEMP WHERE HOLIDAY_YMD = PAPRYYYYMM),0) * 10 ) AS CNT -- 월근무MH(근무일수*10시간) , (nullif((SELECT CNT FROM TEMP WHERE HOLIDAY_YMD = PAPRYYYYMM),0) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '0') AS INT) ) AS CNT -- 월근무MH(근무일수*10시간) , (SELECT CNT FROM TEMP WHERE HOLIDAY_YMD = PAPRYYYYMM) AS CNT3 , SUM(TOT_MH) AS TOT_MH -- 실적M/H , DEC(nullif(SUM(CNT2),0), 10, 1) AS CNT2 -- 보유인원 , DEC(nullif(SUM(TOT_MH),0)/ nullif(SUM(CNT2),0), 10, 2) AS PER_TOT_MH --인당실적MH(실적MH/월말보유인원) , DEC( (NULLIF(SUM(TOT_MH),0) / (NULLIF(SUM(CNT2),0) ) ) / ((SELECT CNT FROM TEMP WHERE HOLIDAY_YMD = PAPRYYYYMM) * CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '0') AS INT) ) , 10, 2) AS CNT1 -- 인당기성설치대수 = 인당실적MH/월평균인당MH(근무일수*10) FROM ( ( SELECT TAXDATE AS PAPRYYYYMM , MANDT , LIFNR , TEMNO , 0 AS CNT2 -- 보유인원 , CASE WHEN SUM(TOT_MH) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(TOT_MH) END AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT , TAXDATE , PSPID , POSID , SEQNO , LIFNR , TEMNO , DEC(DEC(PRO_R/100,15,3) * (CASE WHEN WSCALE = 0 THEN 0 ELSE DEC(TOT/WSCALE,15,2) END), 15,2) AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT , SUBSTR(A.TAXDATE,1,6) AS TAXDATE , A.PSPID , A.POSID , A.SEQNO , B.CHGNO , A.LIFNR , C.TEMNO2 AS TEMNO , A.PRO_R , B.LABMH , B.TOT , B.WSCALE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0116 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0034 AS K ON A.MANDT = K.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = K.LIFNR AND K.GBN = 'A' AND (K.SO = 'X' OR K.SO3 = 'X') INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0100 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.PSPID AND A.POSID = B.POSID INNER JOIN ( SELECT S.MANDT, S.PSPID, S.POSID, S.CHGNO FROM ( SELECT MANDT, PSPID, POSID, MAX(CHGNO) AS CHGNO FROM saphee.ZPST0113 WHERE CNF_GBN='A' AND GUBUN='5' AND STATE='Y' GROUP BY MANDT, PSPID, POSID ) S ) AS P ON A.MANDT = P.MANDT AND A.PSPID = P.PSPID AND A.POSID = P.POSID AND B.CHGNO = P.CHGNO INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.PSPID = C.POSID AND A.POSID = C.POSID_1 WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (substr(A.TAXDATE,1,6) BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT#) AND A.BELNR > '0000000000' AND K.SO5 <> 'X'
AND C.TEMNO2 = #ZTEMNO#
AND A.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND B.SPECT = #ATYPE#
AND CAST(REPLACE(B.KINDS, ' ', '0') AS INT) >= 300
AND CAST(REPLACE(B.KINDS, ' ', '0') AS INT) BETWEEN #SPEC# AND #SPEC2#
AND A.GUBUN = #CHK_GBN#
) ) GROUP BY MANDT, TAXDATE, LIFNR, TEMNO ) -- 실적MH
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD0#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM,MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , CASE WHEN COUNT(PERKEY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(PERKEY) END AS CNT2 --보유인원 , 0 AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD0# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD0# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR,TEMNO
)
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD1#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM,MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , CASE WHEN COUNT(PERKEY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(PERKEY) END AS CNT2 --보유인원 , 0 AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD1# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD1# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR,TEMNO
)
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD2#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM,MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , CASE WHEN COUNT(PERKEY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(PERKEY) END AS CNT2 --보유인원 , 0 AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD2# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD2# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR,TEMNO
)
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD3#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM,MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , CASE WHEN COUNT(PERKEY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(PERKEY) END AS CNT2 --보유인원 , 0 AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD3# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD3# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR,TEMNO
)
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD4#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM,MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , CASE WHEN COUNT(PERKEY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(PERKEY) END AS CNT2 --보유인원 , 0 AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD4# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD4# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR,TEMNO
)
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD5#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM,MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , CASE WHEN COUNT(PERKEY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(PERKEY) END AS CNT2 --보유인원 , 0 AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD5# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD5# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR,TEMNO
)
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD6#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM,MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , CASE WHEN COUNT(PERKEY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(PERKEY) END AS CNT2 --보유인원 , 0 AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD6# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD6# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR,TEMNO
)
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD7#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM,MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , CASE WHEN COUNT(PERKEY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(PERKEY) END AS CNT2 --보유인원 , 0 AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD7# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD7# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR,TEMNO
)
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD8#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM,MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , CASE WHEN COUNT(PERKEY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(PERKEY) END AS CNT2 --보유인원 , 0 AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD8# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD8# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR,TEMNO
)
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD9#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM,MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , CASE WHEN COUNT(PERKEY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(PERKEY) END AS CNT2 --보유인원 , 0 AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD9# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD9# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR,TEMNO
)
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD10#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM,MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , CASE WHEN COUNT(PERKEY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(PERKEY) END AS CNT2 --보유인원 , 0 AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD10# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD10# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR,TEMNO
)
UNION ALL ( SELECT substr(#YYYYMMDD11#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM,MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO , CASE WHEN COUNT(PERKEY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(PERKEY) END AS CNT2 --보유인원 , 0 AS TOT_MH FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD11# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD11# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR,TEMNO
)
) GROUP BY PAPRYYYYMM, MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO
) AS Q INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0034 AS C ON Q.MANDT = C.MANDT AND Q.LIFNR = C.LIFNR AND C.GBN = 'A' AND (C.SO = 'X' OR C.SO3 = 'X') INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 KK ON Q.MANDT = KK.MANDT AND Q.LIFNR = KK.LIFNR AND Q.TEMNO = KK.TEMNO AND KK.DELEF = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 W ON Q.MANDT = W.MANDT AND Q.LIFNR = W.LIFNR INNER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT , DTEXT3 AS TEAM_CD , DTEXT4 AS TEAM_NM , CODE2 AS ZZACTSS_CD , CTEXT2 AS ZZACTSS_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE N WHERE N.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND N.DTEXT3 <> '' AND N.LANG = 'ko' ) L ON W.MANDT = L.MANDT AND W.ZZACTSS = L.ZZACTSS_CD WHERE Q.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (W.ZZACTSS IS NOT NULL OR W.ZZACTSS != '' OR W.ZZACTSS != ' ') AND C.SO5 <> 'X'
AND (C.EL_INDC = 'X' OR (C.EL_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND Q.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND (C.ES_INDC = 'X' OR (C.ES_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND Q.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND W.ZZACTSS IN ( SELECT CODE2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = Q.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'PS003' AND LANG = 'ko' AND DTEXT3 = #TEMNO# )
AND W.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
